title: vrndAvanadoLu ADuvan
sahitya:
vrndAvanadoLu Aduvan yArE gOpi candravadana nODuva bAre


caraNam 1    aruNa pallava pADa yugagaLa divya marakata manjuLAbharaNane 
sirivara yadukula sOmane intha paripUrNa kAma nissImane
    caraNam 2    hAra hIra guNa dhArane divya sAra sharIra shrngArane 
ArigAdaru mana dUrane tanna sEridavara mAta mIrane
    caraNam 3    makara kuNDala kAnti bharitane divya akaLanka rUpa lAvaNyane 
sakalaroLage dEvanItane namma mukutIsha purandara viTTalane
